argumentText:
ARGUMENT
x y

| Step | Hyp | Ref | Expression |
|---|---|---|---|

| 1 |  | #P_cnfldbas | |- CC = ( Base ` CCfld ) |
| 2 |  | #P_cnfldadd | |- + = ( +g ` CCfld ) |
| 3 |  | #P_eqid | |- ( invg ` CCfld ) = ( invg ` CCfld ) |
| 4 |  | #P_eqid | |- ( -g ` CCfld ) = ( -g ` CCfld ) |
| 5 | 1, 2, 3, 4 | #P_grpsubval | |- ( ( x e. CC /\ y e. CC ) -> ( x ( -g ` CCfld ) y ) = ( x + ( ( invg ` CCfld ) ` y ) ) ) |
| 6 |  | #P_cnfldneg | |- ( y e. CC -> ( ( invg ` CCfld ) ` y ) = -u y ) |
| 7 | 6 | #P_adantl | |- ( ( x e. CC /\ y e. CC ) -> ( ( invg ` CCfld ) ` y ) = -u y ) |
| 8 | 7 | #P_oveq2d | |- ( ( x e. CC /\ y e. CC ) -> ( x + ( ( invg ` CCfld ) ` y ) ) = ( x + -u y ) ) |
| 9 |  | #P_negsub | |- ( ( x e. CC /\ y e. CC ) -> ( x + -u y ) = ( x - y ) ) |
| 10 | 5, 8, 9 | #P_3eqtrrd | |- ( ( x e. CC /\ y e. CC ) -> ( x - y ) = ( x ( -g ` CCfld ) y ) ) |
| 11 | 10 | #P_mpt2eq3ia | |- ( x e. CC , y e. CC |-> ( x - y ) ) = ( x e. CC , y e. CC |-> ( x ( -g ` CCfld ) y ) ) |
| 12 |  | #P_subf | |- - : ( CC X. CC ) --> CC |
| 13 |  | #P_ffn | |- ( - : ( CC X. CC ) --> CC -> - Fn ( CC X. CC ) ) |
| 14 | 12, 13 | #P_ax-mp | |- - Fn ( CC X. CC ) |
| 15 |  | #P_fnov | |- ( - Fn ( CC X. CC ) <-> - = ( x e. CC , y e. CC |-> ( x - y ) ) ) |
| 16 | 14, 15 | #P_mpbi | |- - = ( x e. CC , y e. CC |-> ( x - y ) ) |
| 17 |  | #P_cnring | |- CCfld e. Ring |
| 18 |  | #P_ringgrp | |- ( CCfld e. Ring -> CCfld e. Grp ) |
| 19 | 17, 18 | #P_ax-mp | |- CCfld e. Grp |
| 20 | 1, 4 | #P_grpsubf | |- ( CCfld e. Grp -> ( -g ` CCfld ) : ( CC X. CC ) --> CC ) |
| 21 |  | #P_ffn | |- ( ( -g ` CCfld ) : ( CC X. CC ) --> CC -> ( -g ` CCfld ) Fn ( CC X. CC ) ) |
| 22 | 19, 20, 21 | #P_mp2b | |- ( -g ` CCfld ) Fn ( CC X. CC ) |
| 23 |  | #P_fnov | |- ( ( -g ` CCfld ) Fn ( CC X. CC ) <-> ( -g ` CCfld ) = ( x e. CC , y e. CC |-> ( x ( -g ` CCfld ) y ) ) ) |
| 24 | 22, 23 | #P_mpbi | |- ( -g ` CCfld ) = ( x e. CC , y e. CC |-> ( x ( -g ` CCfld ) y ) ) |
| 25 | 11, 16, 24 | #P_3eqtr4i | |- - = ( -g ` CCfld ) |
